tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE peer_review_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(50),
    submission_date DATE,
    review_date DATE,
    review_comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE peer_review_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_id UUID,
    submission_id UUID,
    review_date DATE,
    review_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE research_management (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    paper_id UUID,
    author_id UUID,
    publication_date DATE,
    research_theme VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE comprehensive_analysis (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id UUID,
    peer_review_id UUID,
    research_id UUID,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE research_management_system (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE peer_review_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    author_id INT,
    paper_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    rating INT,
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_management_system (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    funding_source TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE integration_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_id INT,
    peer_review_id INT,
    integration_date DATE,
    integration_status BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE comprehensive_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    research_id INT,
    review_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    result TEXT
);
